name: Bellman
long_description:
We are a team of ex-Mercor, Databricks, Google and Bespoke Labs Engineers building out a platform to empower the next generation of Market Research. 

We assist in designing interviews, sourcing thousands of participants, and conducting AI-powered research at unprecedented scale. Get actionable insights in hours, not weeks.

We've built our custom analytics layer capable of working through 1000s of transcripts to extract truly meaningful insights.
